decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: P1 (Existing Location, Site and Block Plans), P2 (Existing Ground and Level One Floor Plans), P3 (Existing Level Two and Roof Plans), P4 (Existing Elevation Plans), P5 (Existing Sections and Garden Room Elevation Plans), P6 (Proposed Location, Site and Block Plans), P7 (Proposed Ground and Level One Floor Plans), P7 (Proposed Level Two and Roof Plans), P9 (Proposed Elevation Plans), P10 (Proposed Sections and Garden Room Elevation Plans).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per the submitted application form or approved drawings (Condition 2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18), policies D3 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - sections 12 and 16. | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (as amended), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Alteration of fenestration at front, rear and side (west) incorporating two Juliet balconies at first floor rear elevation; roof alterations involving the installation of rooflights to the front, rear and side roof slopes; Extension of the existing outbuilding and associated external alterations
